name: My Goddess is Upset
description:
"I am getting tired of all that drinking of yours! Weren't you supposed to be my hero?" 

Your Goddess is, well, upset with you, since all you do is going to bars to get wasted. Because of that, she's forced a challenge upon you: survive her tower, and she'll shower you in her protection once again. However, it's not gonna be easy... "Oh, you like getting wasted, hmm? Let's see how you like losing control of your actions RIGHT NOW!"

With a temporary lack of ability to jump, move, or even see, survive her tower, avoid her divine retribution, and learn of this... or go back to your ways, if you'd like... it doesn't seem like a good idea, when divine retribution means a meteor to your face..

Controls:

- Movement: A, D or arrow keys

- Jump/Double Jump: Spacebar. (Hold to jump higher).

- Dash: Left Shift.
